title: Ставка на любовь
overview: «Stavka na lyubov'» is an extreme reality show where star couples test the strength of their feelings. According to the rules of the project, participants undergo tests and place "bets" on their partners: will they cope or not. Those who guess the outcome of the tests receive immunity, and those who do not guess are nominated by voting. Only one couple will win and receive a cash prize.
